metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter stating that he has not written Stearns because of illness, shortening his stay in Shanghai. While there is no special news, he notes that China is building four railways. He encloses a draft for $300 and apologizes for the delay of the letter.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
